languages.text: "Да врет она, сука лживая!" {n}Побитый офицер злобно щерится.{/n} "Они кровью для вида измазались, вылезли и давай причитать: "О нет, на корабль напали, враги везде, срочно в соседний отсек!". Мы бросились проверять, а они взломали резаками хранилище на посту, достали оружие и направились в реакторную".

"She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."
languages.original_text: "Да врет она, сука лживая!" {n}Побитый офицер злобно щерится.{/n} "Они кровью для вида измазались, вылезли и давай причитать: "О нет, на корабль напали, враги везде, срочно в соседний отсек!". Мы бросились проверять, а они взломали резаками хранилище на посту, достали оружие и направились в реакторную".

traits.locale_text: "She's lying, the bitch!" {n}A battered officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared themselves in blood to put up a show, crawled out, and started wailing, 'Oh no! The ship's been attacked! Enemies everywhere! Go to the next bay right now!' So we hurried off to check and they used their cutters to break into weapon storage at our guard station, took the guns, and headed for the reactor room."

"She's lying, the bitch!" {n}A battered officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared themselves in blood to put up a show, crawled out, and started wailing, 'Oh no! The ship's been attacked! Enemies everywhere! Go to the next bay right now!' So we hurried off to check and they used their cutters to break into weapon storage at our guard station, took the guns, and headed for the reactor room."

"She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

"She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

"She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

"She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

languages.text: « Elle ment ! {n}intervient avec colère un officier blessé.{/n} Ils se sont couverts eux-mêmes de sang et sont sortis tous paniqués du tunnel en hurlant : "Oh non ! Le vaisseau est attaqué ! Il y a des ennemis partout ! Défendez la baie !" Nous nous sommes précipités sur place pour enquêter, et ils en ont profité pour forcer le dépôt d'armes de notre poste de garde avec leurs découpeuses. Ils ont volé nos armes avant de foncer vers la salle du réacteur. »
languages.original_text: "She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

traits.locale_text: « Elle ment ! {n}intervient avec colère un officier blessé.{/n} Ils se sont couverts eux-mêmes de sang et sont sortis tous paniqués du tunnel en hurlant : "Oh non ! Le vaisseau est attaqué ! Il y a des ennemis partout ! Défendez la baie !" Nous nous sommes précipités sur place pour enquêter, et ils en ont profité pour forcer le dépôt d'armes de notre poste de garde avec leurs découpeuses. Ils ont volé nos armes avant de foncer vers la salle du réacteur. »

languages.text: «¡Miente!». {n}Un oficial herido frunce el ceño con furia.{/n} «¡Se mancharon con sangre y se arrastraron del túnel gritando que la nave estaba bajo ataque, que había enemigos por todas partes y que teníamos que defender la bahía! Cuando salimos corriendo a investigar, usaron sus cortadores para colarse en el almacén de armas de nuestra estación de guardia. Robaron las armas y fueron derechos a la sala del reactor».
languages.original_text: "She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

traits.locale_text: «¡Miente!». {n}Un oficial herido frunce el ceño con furia.{/n} «¡Se mancharon con sangre y se arrastraron del túnel gritando que la nave estaba bajo ataque, que había enemigos por todas partes y que teníamos que defender la bahía! Cuando salimos corriendo a investigar, usaron sus cortadores para colarse en el almacén de armas de nuestra estación de guardia. Robaron las armas y fueron derechos a la sala del reactor».

languages.text: “她在胡说八道！”{n}一位受伤的军官愤怒地吼了起来。{/n}“他们把自己身上抹得到处是血，从管道里爬出来，大声哭喊说：‘啊，完了！有人在袭击飞船！到处都是敌人！快保护甲板！’趁我们所有人都冲过去调查的时候，他们用等离子切割机破开了警卫站武器库的大门，偷走了枪，直奔反应堆室去了。”
languages.original_text: "She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

traits.locale_text: “她在胡说八道！”{n}一位受伤的军官愤怒地吼了起来。{/n}“他们把自己身上抹得到处是血，从管道里爬出来，大声哭喊说：‘啊，完了！有人在袭击飞船！到处都是敌人！快保护甲板！’趁我们所有人都冲过去调查的时候，他们用等离子切割机破开了警卫站武器库的大门，偷走了枪，直奔反应堆室去了。”

languages.text: 「彼女は嘘を付いています！」{n}負傷した士官が怒った。{/n}「彼らは自分たちに血をぬって、トンネルから這って出てきました。『しまった、船が攻撃された！そこら中に敵がいる！湾を守れ！』と叫びながらね。私達はすぐに調べに向かうと、彼らはカッターを使いガードステーションの武器倉庫に忍び込んでいました。銃を盗むと直ちにリアクタールームに戻っていました。」
languages.original_text: "She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は嘘を付いています！」{n}負傷した士官が怒った。{/n}「彼らは自分たちに血をぬって、トンネルから這って出てきました。『しまった、船が攻撃された！そこら中に敵がいる！湾を守れ！』と叫びながらね。私達はすぐに調べに向かうと、彼らはカッターを使いガードステーションの武器倉庫に忍び込んでいました。銃を盗むと直ちにリアクタールームに戻っていました。」

languages.text: "Sie lügt!"{n}, ruft ein verwundeter Offizier zornig aus.{/n} "Sie haben sich mit Blut geschmiert, sind aus dem Tunnel gekrochen und haben geschrien: 'Oh, nein! Das Schiff wurde angegriffen! Es ist alles voller Feinde! Verteidigt das Modul!' Wir sind losgestürmt, um nachzusehen, und sie sind mit ihren Cuttern in das Waffenlager unseres Wachpostens eingebrochen. Sie haben Waffen gestohlen und sind geradewegs in den Reaktorraum gerannt."
languages.original_text: "She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."

traits.locale_text: "Sie lügt!"{n}, ruft ein verwundeter Offizier zornig aus.{/n} "Sie haben sich mit Blut geschmiert, sind aus dem Tunnel gekrochen und haben geschrien: 'Oh, nein! Das Schiff wurde angegriffen! Es ist alles voller Feinde! Verteidigt das Modul!' Wir sind losgestürmt, um nachzusehen, und sie sind mit ihren Cuttern in das Waffenlager unseres Wachpostens eingebrochen. Sie haben Waffen gestohlen und sind geradewegs in den Reaktorraum gerannt."

languages.text: "Yalan söylüyor!" {n}Yaralı bir subay, öfkeyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Kendilerini kana bulayıp 'Olamaz! Gemiye saldırdılar! Her yer düşman kaynıyor! Bölmeyi savunun!' diye feryat kopararak sürüne sürüne tünelden çıktılar. İncelemek için alelacele olay yerine gittik. Onlar da muhafız istasyonumuzdaki silah deposunu yağmalamak için keskilerini kullandı. Silah çalıp doğruca reaktör odasına gittiler."
languages.original_text: "She's lying!" {n}An injured officer scowls angrily.{/n} "They smeared blood on themselves and crawled out of the tunnel wailing, 'Oh, no! The ship's been attacked! There are enemies everywhere! Defend the bay!' We rushed off to investigate, and they used their cutters to break into the weapon storage at our guard station. They stole guns and headed straight for the reactor room."
